message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. You know I'm going to take most of the money anyway. This offer is the most you're getting.
I understand you want a larger share, Alice, but my offer in this round is more than fair.  Let's be realistic, the longer this goes on the less we both get.
Okay, Bob, let's try this again.  I'm feeling generous, but we both know time is money. This offer is more than you'd get if you wait any longer.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. We both lose if this continues.  I'm proposing a 50/50 split to end this now and avoid further losses due to inflation.
